title: App release in PRODUCTION on Google Play Console (ver: 8-1.0.6)
message:
App release in PRODUCTION on Google Play Console (ver: 8-1.0.6)
- ADD Android O "App Shortcuts" support. Add 3 shortcuts: Specimen Copy, Book Correction, News.
- MyProfile: Remove Work details 1st row if details is incomplete. (when user 1st time come after signup, we have only Institute name.)
- Version 8-1.0.6 app release on Google Play Store in Production
